dimension: 92 x 46 in. (233.68 x 116.8 cm) (each, without fringe at both ends)
title: Hip and Shoulder Wrap Cloths (Hinggi)
description: each 2 panels sewn together vertically; natural dyes (indigo, rust) on natural ground; ikat patterning, anthropomorphic figures and crocodiles with floral images; unfinished warp ends
